Function tlx493d_disableInterrupt(TLx493D_t *)¶

  • Defined in File tlx493d.h

Function Documentation¶

bool tlx493d_disableInterrupt(TLx493D_t *sensor)

The function tlx493d_disableInterrupt is used to disable interrupts for a TLx493D sensor.

Parameters

sensor – [inout] A pointer to a TLx493D_t struct, which represents the TLx493D sensor.

Return values

  • 0 – Error.

  • 1 – Function execution was successful.

Returns

The function tlx493d_disableInterrupt is returning a boolean value.
